definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

sentences.english: “What was it like to grow up with only a father?” Hanfeng asked.
sentences.chinese: 瀚峯問道，“從小長大隻有父親會是怎麼樣呢？”

sentences.english: Subsequently, the Hanhai army stationed at Tingzhou, which related Hanhai to the western region.
sentences.chinese: 隨後瀚海軍府在庭州設立，又使瀚海與西域相關聯。

sentences.english: Hanfeng had returned from the States a month before.
sentences.chinese: 瀚峯一個月前剛從美國回來。

sentences.english: Hanfeng wondered if Siyu had felt similar pressure from his mother.
sentences.chinese: 瀚峯不知道思玉是否一樣感受到了母親的壓力。

sentences.english: Tony received a Bachelor of Business Administration from Chinese University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 黃瀚泓畢業於香港中文大學，獲得工商管理學士學位。

sentences.english: Hanfeng looked around, but there was no one there besides the girl at the counter.
sentences.chinese: 瀚峯看了一下四周，除了櫃檯裏那個女孩沒有別人。

sentences.english: “He must be the most loving father in the world, ” Hanfeng said.
sentences.chinese: 瀚峯說，“他肯定是這個世界上最有愛心的父親了。”

sentences.english: HyD. Star Fluid Controls is a Joint - stock company of China and America.
sentences.chinese: 瀚德斯流體控制公司是一家中美合作的股份制企業。

sentences.english: Han billion intended to sign a day, Ding day promised to arrest.
sentences.chinese: 瀚億有意拉攏兆天，答應緝捕丁日。

sentences.english: Hanfeng turned away from Siyu’s gaze and looked out the window.
sentences.chinese: 瀚峯避開思玉的眼光，朝窗外張望。

sentences.english: ZhuangZhuoYuan also to care about his towers and sister relationship status of the cold war.
sentences.chinese: 莊卓源亦乘機關心瀚韜與姐姐戀情的冷戰狀況。

sentences.english: Siyu asked a few more questions, and Hanfeng replied.
sentences.chinese: 思玉又問了幾個問題，瀚峯也一一作答。

sentences.english: She wondered if that was how Hanfeng thought of his father.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道瀚峯對他死去的父親是否也是這樣想的。

sentences.english: Hanfeng had asked, pretending that he did not understand and knowing that she could see through him.
sentences.chinese: 瀚峯問道，假裝不知道母親其實已經看穿了自己。

definition: clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
bright/luminous/white (esp. bright white teeth of youth or white hair of old age)
(of the day) long/old variant of 暢|畅[chang4]
sunshine/to shine upon/variant of 輝|辉[hui1]
